# Author: Rares Vernica <rares (at) ics.uci.edu>
#

all: core util listmerger filtertree filtertree/wrappers \
	partenum sepia stringmap

.PHONY: core util listmerger filtertree filtertree/wrappers \
	partenum sepia stringmap

common:
	$(MAKE) -C common

util:
	$(MAKE) -C util

listmerger:
	$(MAKE) -C listmerger

filtertree:
	$(MAKE) -C filtertree

filtertree/wrappers:
	$(MAKE) -C filtertree/wrappers

partenum:
	$(MAKE) -C partenum

sepia:
	$(MAKE) -C sepia

stringmap:
	$(MAKE) -C stringmap

.PHONY: clean
clean:
	$(MAKE) -C common clean
	$(MAKE) -C util clean
	$(MAKE) -C listmerger clean
	$(MAKE) -C filtertree clean
	$(MAKE) -C filtertree/wrappers clean
	$(MAKE) -C partenum clean
	$(MAKE) -C sepia clean
	$(MAKE) -C stringmap clean
